title: I Miss Urf... (WAIT, DONT RUN! I'M NOT TALKING ABOUT THE GAME MODE!)
body:
Many moons ago, a certain jungler who shall remain nameless (*cough*   {{champion:19}} *cough* ) killed our best friend.
Tears were shed, and emotions were felt stronger than the effects of the OMNISPLASH. I request a call to arms to all of those
who remember the TRUE Urf, not this laurel wearing idol that is merely a capitalist ploy, but our friend. The little manatee that just
wanted to fight in the league with his spatula and minigun.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sina,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EEipFhlU,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-01T16:19:09.241+0000)
>
> Many moons ago, a certain jungler who shall remain nameless (*cough*   {{champion:19}} *cough* ) killed our best friend.

That got retconned, don't you know? There is no League of Legends or summoners or Journal of Justice, meaning that Warwick would never have discovered Urf, and Urf never would have died.
Granted, Urf never would have heard about Jax, who also no longer exists, so he probably never would have learned to fight.
That means that in the new lore, Urf is living a peaceful life somewhere, oblivious to the troubles of the world. What more could a manatee ask for?

> [{quoted}](name=Shadragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EEipFhlU,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-04-02T00:12:02.411+0000)
>
> That got retconned, don't you know? There is no League of Legends or summoners or Journal of Justice, meaning that Warwick would never have discovered Urf, and Urf never would have died.
> Granted, Urf never would have heard about Jax, who also no longer exists, so he probably never would have learned to fight.
> That means that in the new lore, Urf is living a peaceful life somewhere, oblivious to the troubles of the world. What more could a manatee ask for?

Maybe, but I for one will not allow the megling genocide to go unforgotten, or the eventual assassination of our dear aquatic friend.
That part and along with Jax is probably just floating in the realm of unsolved retcon issues.
I think they should make his ghost fly away from the ashes after turrets are destroyed.

Riot should release him somewhere down the line, kind of like how they did with Elise being based off of the conceptual champion, Priscilla. Maybe have a skin or interaction that pays a bit of homage to the best joke League of Legends has ever spawned

If you think about it, jinx is kinda the same kit.  Urf swapped weapons, Jinx swaps weapons.  Urf had a move speed boosting passive, Jinx has a move speed boosting passive.  Urf dealt tons of damage, Jinx deals tons of damage.  The parallels are there
URF Jinx Ultimate Skin confirmed.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Passive: Moved faster on water.
Q: Throws spatula like mundos Q.
W: Eats enemy champions, like volibears W.
E: Body slam that would knock enemies up, like cho gaths knock up.
R: Urf Gatling gun. Literally kog maw at 60minutes full build.
Report {{champion:26}} for not ulting URF.
The spirit of Urf lives on in Spirit Guard Udyr.
...I wish there was a way to get Urfwick.
hextech
After you get your 14 kayle champ shards and a spectral fiddle skin shard. And after you grind for 7 months for key frags.
look at my latest post. i just get good stuff...
Its not even that hard to get them, and if you have a job you can just buy them.
I don't think you can get him through hextech crafting as that doesn't include limited skins.

It may, I know it does include uber-legacy skins that haven't ever come out of the vault before.

That, and I could have sworn that the Urf Warwick skin never got released... (at the very least, I've looked through the game files and can't find any resources for it).

From what I've read the boxes can include legacy skins,but not limited skins.

And Urf warwick isn't shown in the ingame client unless you own him already,but it is definetly out.

I'm a proud owner of Urf the {{champion:267}}-tee.
I make sure to ruin {{champion:19}}'s ult every chance I get in honor to our lost friend.
{{champion:42}} He's up to snuff and flying me around!
All I want is a Big Blue Watery Road.
And on that fateful day, {{champion:64}} was born

> [{quoted}](name=Sina,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EEipFhlU,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-01T16:19:09.241+0000)
> The little manatee that just wanted to fight in the league with his spatula and minigun.

why do i picture baby urf with spatula

Agreed.  I made a whole topic about Urf Day history stuff, I love that guy. 

Then again I also love Draven.  So I mean, I can't be too upset.  But I will never stop pining for my manatee love.  Someday he will splash again, down the Big Blue Watery Road.
Great post. You made me smile. :)
The ghost of Urf comes to fight.

Urf forced Corki to carry him around, killed five Poros, and clapped when the deed was done.

I can never forgive Urf for that.
